item.title: By: Geoffrey Dennis
item.dc:creator: Geoffrey Dennis
item.description: Thanks for quoting my blog on Taharah, but your link to my site is dead.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for quoting my blog on Taharah, but your link to my site is dead.

item.title: By: David Zinner
item.dc:creator: David Zinner
item.description:
Thank you for writing about Zayin Adar. Numerous communities, many non-Orthodox, celebrated Zayin Adar. For example in Princeton, NJ, Harley Felstein spoke about abandoned Jewish cemeteries and cemetery restoration.
I gave 7 lecture/workshops in Pittsburgh, to Reconstructionist, Reform, and Conservative shuls, as well as a public lecture. I also spoke at the Zayin Adar Chevra Kadisha dinner about the Gamliel Institute which is training future Chevra Kadisha leaders.
Glad that you like our web site. We've passed the 1 million visitor mark!
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for writing about Zayin Adar. Numerous communities, many non-Orthodox, celebrated Zayin Adar. For example in Princeton, NJ, Harley Felstein spoke about abandoned Jewish cemeteries and cemetery restoration.

I gave 7 lecture/workshops in Pittsburgh, to Reconstructionist, Reform, and Conservative shuls, as well as a public lecture. I also spoke at the Zayin Adar Chevra Kadisha dinner about the Gamliel Institute which is training future Chevra Kadisha leaders.

Glad that you like our web site. We’ve passed the 1 million visitor mark!
